Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Vaguely \Vague"ly\, adv. In a vague manner. [1913 Webster]
What he vaguely hinted at, but dared not speak. --Hawthorne. [1913 Webster]
vaguely adv : in a vague way; "he looked vaguely familiar"; "he explained it somewhat mistily" [syn: {mistily}]
